lead_paragraph: Antigovernment protests in the Democratic Republic of Congo have left at least a dozen people dead, officials said Thursday, as the Senate postponed a vote on a proposed law that the opposition fears will prolong the president’s time in power.
snippet: Antigovernment protests in the Democratic Republic of Congo have left at least a dozen people dead, officials said Thursday, as the Senate postponed a vote on a proposed law that the opposition fears will prolong the president’s time in power.

headline.main: Congo: A Proposed Law Stirs Protests
headline.print_headline: Congo: A Proposed Law Stirs Protests
